jeffrey_epstein.bg: Financier and convicted sex offender. Former Bear Stearns trader who built a mysterious wealth management firm. Owned properties in Manhattan ($77M townhouse), Palm Beach, Paris, New Mexico (Zorro Ranch), and two private islands in the US Virgin Islands. Net worth estimated $500M+.
jeffrey_epstein.conn: Central figure. Convicted in 2008 Florida plea deal for soliciting a minor. Arrested again July 2019 on federal sex trafficking charges. Found dead in Metropolitan Correctional Center August 10, 2019, ruled suicide.
jeffrey_epstein.ev: 7,546 emails in archive spanning 2002-2019. 4,292 documented flights. Convicted sex offender. Federal indictment for sex trafficking of minors.
jeffrey_epstein.status: Deceased. Died August 10, 2019 in federal custody. Death ruled suicide by hanging. Two broken bones in neck (hyoid bone). Cameras malfunctioned. Guards fell asleep. Case remains subject of conspiracy theories.

ghislaine_maxwell.bg: Daughter of British media mogul Robert Maxwell. Oxford-educated socialite who moved to New York after her father's mysterious death in 1991. Founded the Terramar Project ocean charity. Was Epstein's longtime girlfriend and later his closest associate and alleged chief recruiter.
ghislaine_maxwell.conn: 1,221 emails in archive. Primary accomplice in Epstein's trafficking operation. Recruited, groomed, and trafficked underage girls. Convicted December 2021 on five of six counts including sex trafficking of a minor.
ghislaine_maxwell.ev: Convicted on 5 federal counts including sex trafficking. 1,221 emails show daily operational coordination. Named by multiple victims as primary recruiter.
ghislaine_maxwell.status: Imprisoned. Sentenced to 20 years in federal prison June 2022. Currently incarcerated at FCI Tallahassee, Florida. Appeal denied. Earliest release date approximately 2037.

steve_bannon.bg: Former Goldman Sachs investment banker, Hollywood producer, and executive chairman of Breitbart News. Served as White House Chief Strategist under Trump (2017). Co-founded Cambridge Analytica. Pardoned by Trump for fraud charges related to We Build the Wall campaign.
steve_bannon.conn: 526 emails + 3,356 iMessages (highest iMessage count in archive). Extensive political strategy discussions with Epstein during Trump presidency. 'Somebody big has u in gunsights' warning.
steve_bannon.ev: 3,356 iMessages — most of any contact. Political strategy exchanges with convicted sex offender throughout Trump presidency. Introduced to Larry Summers via Epstein.
steve_bannon.status: Alive. Convicted of contempt of Congress July 2022 for refusing Jan 6 subpoena. Sentenced to 4 months, served at FCI Danbury. Released October 2024. Pardoned by Trump on original fraud charges. Remains influential in MAGA movement.

lesley_groff.bg: Jeffrey Epstein's longtime executive assistant and primary information gatekeeper. Managed his correspondence, scheduling, and daily operations for over two decades. One of only six people present across all four eras of the network.
lesley_groff.conn: ~800 emails. Forwarded hundreds of messages. Scheduling gatekeeper for Epstein's entire operation across all eras. Named as potential co-conspirator in federal proceedings.
lesley_groff.ev: Named as potential co-conspirator. ~800 emails spanning all eras. Central node connecting inner circle operations. Received non-prosecution agreement in 2008 plea deal.
lesley_groff.status: Alive. Received non-prosecution agreement in 2008 plea deal. Sued by Virgin Islands AG. Named in multiple civil lawsuits. Reached settlement with some victims.

ehud_barak.bg: Former Prime Minister of Israel (1999-2001), former Defense Minister, and most decorated soldier in Israeli history. After politics, became tech investor and chairman of Carbyne, a 911 technology startup partly funded by Epstein.
ehud_barak.conn: 1,041 emails. Carbyne startup investment connection with Epstein. Introduced to Noam Chomsky via Epstein. Photographed entering Epstein's Manhattan townhouse. Frequent scheduling in archive.
ehud_barak.ev: 1,041 emails — 2nd highest in archive. Photographed entering Epstein's NYC home. Carbyne investment connection. Epstein brokered Barak-Chomsky dinner in Cambridge.
ehud_barak.status: Alive. Acknowledged meeting Epstein but denied wrongdoing. Admitted visiting Epstein properties. Photos published by Daily Mail showed him entering Epstein's Manhattan home. No criminal charges.

darren_indyke.bg: Partner at Indyke & Associates. Served as Jeffrey Epstein's primary attorney and architect of his complex legal and business structures, including numerous LLCs in the US Virgin Islands. Co-executor of Epstein's estate.
darren_indyke.conn: ~600 emails. Attorney managing VI LLCs, Compass Point, and all legal/business matters across all eras. Architect of Epstein's complex corporate structure designed to shield assets.
darren_indyke.ev: ~600 emails spanning all eras. Designed the corporate structure (Compass Point, VI LLCs) that enabled Epstein's operations. Co-executor of estate worth $600M+.
darren_indyke.status: Alive. Co-executor of Epstein estate. Sued by US Virgin Islands AG for facilitating trafficking. Named in multiple civil suits. Under investigation for role in estate management.

richard_kahn.bg: Epstein's daily financial manager and news briefer. Co-executor of Epstein's estate alongside Darren Indyke. Managed Epstein's financial interests and provided daily news briefings via email.
richard_kahn.conn: ~500 emails. Daily news sharing, financial matters, Trump commentary. One of six constant-presence contacts across all eras.
richard_kahn.ev: ~500 emails. Co-executor of $600M+ estate. Daily operational financial management for convicted sex offender across all eras.
richard_kahn.status: Alive. Co-executor of Epstein estate. Named in civil lawsuits and USVI AG investigation. Under scrutiny for estate management role.

larry_summers.bg: 71st US Secretary of the Treasury (1999-2001) under Clinton. 27th President of Harvard University (2001-2006, resigned amid controversy). Director of National Economic Council under Obama (2009-2010). Professor at Harvard. Net worth estimated $40M+.
larry_summers.conn: 783 emails + 72 iMessages. FLIGHT CONFIRMED: Treasure Cay to Palm Beach, Feb 16 2013. Political discussions, 'Buddha' correction. Epstein brokered dinner with Steve Bannon.
larry_summers.ev: 783 emails + flight manifest HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_006294 confirming flight with Epstein and Woody Allen from Bahamas. Epstein brokered Summers-Bannon dinner.
larry_summers.status: Alive. Professor at Harvard Kennedy School. Acknowledged meeting Epstein but said relationship was about intellectual discussions. No criminal charges. Continues as prominent public intellectual and economic commentator.

alan_dershowitz.bg: Felix Frankfurter Professor of Law Emeritus at Harvard Law School. One of America's most prominent appellate lawyers. Defended OJ Simpson, Harvey Weinstein, Trump (impeachment), and Epstein. Author of numerous books on law and civil liberties.
alan_dershowitz.conn: 38 emails. FLIGHT CONFIRMED: TEB to Miami, Dec 14 2007. Defended Epstein in 2008 plea deal. Named by Virginia Giuffre in allegations (which he vigorously denied). Defended Ghislaine Maxwell.
alan_dershowitz.ev: Flight manifest HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_005644 confirming flight with Epstein and Igor Zinoviev. Named in Virginia Giuffre allegations. Defended both Epstein and Maxwell legally.
alan_dershowitz.status: Alive. Settled defamation suit with Virginia Giuffre in 2022. Has vigorously denied all allegations of sexual misconduct. Continues practicing law and making media appearances. Published memoir addressing Epstein connection.

bill_gates.bg: Co-founder of Microsoft. Served as CEO until 2000, chairman until 2014. Co-chair of Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation. Was world's richest person for many years. Net worth ~$130B. Divorced Melinda French Gates in 2021; Epstein relationship cited as factor.
bill_gates.conn: FLIGHT CONFIRMED: TEB to Palm Beach, Mar 1 2013, N909JE (HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_006289). Multiple meetings at Epstein's Manhattan townhouse documented by NYT. Connected via Melanie Walker and Boris Nikolic.
bill_gates.ev: Flight manifest HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_006289 confirming flight with Epstein. NYT documented multiple meetings at Epstein's townhouse 2011-2014. Epstein connection cited in divorce.
bill_gates.status: Alive. Acknowledged meeting Epstein but said it was about philanthropy and he regretted it. Epstein relationship contributed to 2021 divorce from Melinda. No criminal charges. Continues philanthropy via Gates Foundation.

bill_clinton.bg: 42nd President (1993-2001). Rhodes Scholar, Yale Law graduate, former Governor of Arkansas. Founded Clinton Foundation. Net worth estimated $120M. One of the most recognizable figures linked to Epstein through flight logs.
bill_clinton.conn: 26+ documented flights on the Lolita Express. Visited Little St. James Island according to witnesses. Connected to Maxwell through Clinton Global Initiative.
bill_clinton.ev: 26+ flights on Lolita Express documented in flight logs. Multiple witnesses place him on Epstein's island. Photographed with Maxwell at multiple events.
bill_clinton.status: Alive. Spokesman has said Clinton knew nothing of Epstein's crimes and was never on the island (contradicted by witnesses). No criminal charges. Continues public life through Clinton Foundation.

donald_trump.bg: Real estate developer, TV personality, 45th President (2017-2021), 47th President (2025-). Built Trump Organization real estate empire. Known association with Epstein in 1980s-2000s Palm Beach/NYC social circles. Net worth estimated $5-7B.
donald_trump.conn: Known associate from 1980s-2000s. 'Terrific guy' quote in 2002 New York Magazine. Both members of Mar-a-Lago. Later distanced, claimed to have banned Epstein from Mar-a-Lago. Multiple phone numbers in Epstein's black book.
donald_trump.ev: 'I've known Jeff for 15 years. Terrific guy. He's a lot of fun to be with. It is even said that he likes beautiful women as much as I do, and many of them are on the younger side.' - 2002 quote.
donald_trump.status: Alive. 47th President. Has distanced himself from Epstein, claiming he banned him from Mar-a-Lago. Appeared in some Epstein-related photographs. No criminal charges related to Epstein.

prince_andrew.occ: Member of the British Royal Family
prince_andrew.bg: Third child of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip. Served in Royal Navy during Falklands War. Longtime royal representative for trade and business. His public role collapsed due to Epstein association and Virginia Giuffre lawsuit.
prince_andrew.conn: Close associate of both Epstein and Maxwell. Virginia Giuffre alleged she was trafficked to Andrew when she was 17. Settled civil lawsuit for estimated £12M in 2022. Photographed with arm around Giuffre at Maxwell's London home.
prince_andrew.ev: Virginia Giuffre photograph at Maxwell's London home. Civil settlement ~£12M. Disastrous BBC Newsnight interview Nov 2019. Stripped of military titles and royal patronages by Queen Elizabeth.
prince_andrew.status: Alive. Settled Giuffre lawsuit ~£12M Feb 2022. Stripped of military titles and HRH style. Withdrew from public life. Lives at Royal Lodge, Windsor. Described by press as 'effectively exiled' from royal duties.

les_wexner.bg: Founder and former CEO of L Brands (Victoria's Secret, Bath & Body Works, The Limited). Was Ohio's richest person for decades. Net worth ~$5B. The most significant financial benefactor in Epstein's life, granting him power of attorney and a $77M Manhattan townhouse.
les_wexner.conn: Gave Epstein power of attorney over his finances. Transferred $77M Manhattan townhouse to Epstein. Epstein managed Wexner's finances for years. Severed ties in 2007, claiming Epstein 'misappropriated' funds.
les_wexner.ev: $77M mansion transfer. Power of attorney grant giving Epstein control over personal finances. Only known client of Epstein's financial management firm for years.
les_wexner.status: Alive. Stepped down as L Brands CEO 2020. Said Epstein 'misappropriated vast sums' from him. Cooperated with investigations. No criminal charges. Lives in Ohio.

leon_black.occ: Investor, co-founder of Apollo Global Management
leon_black.bg: Co-founded Apollo Global Management, one of the world's largest private equity firms. Former chairman and CEO. Net worth ~$10B. Paid Epstein $158M in advisory and other fees between 2012-2017.
leon_black.conn: $158M in advisory fees to Epstein. FLIGHT CONFIRMED: TEB to Bedford MA, Apr 15 2012, N909JE (HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_006335). Resigned as Apollo CEO March 2021 after independent review confirmed payments.
leon_black.ev: $158M in documented payments. Flight manifest HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_006335. Independent review by Dechert LLP confirmed $158M but found no wrongdoing beyond poor judgment.
leon_black.status: Alive. Resigned as Apollo CEO March 2021. Remained chairman briefly before stepping down entirely. Independent review found he received legitimate tax and estate planning advice. No criminal charges. Continues as investor.

melanie_walker.bg: Neurosurgeon and science advisor who worked at the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation and the World Bank. Key bridge between Epstein and Bill Gates. Met Epstein in 1992 when she won a beauty pageant.
melanie_walker.conn: 532 iMessages. Primary bridge connecting Epstein to Bill Gates. Gates Foundation advisor who facilitated introductions between the two.
melanie_walker.ev: 532 iMessages. Key intermediary between Epstein and Gates, facilitating the relationship that became a factor in Gates' divorce.
melanie_walker.status: Alive. Left Gates Foundation. Low public profile since Epstein revelations.

joi_ito.occ: Technology entrepreneur, former MIT Media Lab director
joi_ito.bg: Director of MIT Media Lab (2011-2019). Venture capitalist, internet pioneer, and Creative Commons board member. Resigned from MIT after revelations he accepted funding from Epstein and concealed it.
joi_ito.conn: 30 emails + 21 iMessages. $25K ASU funding channel. CONFIRMED on flight STT to BOS with Epstein, Reid Hoffman Nov 30 2014. Resigned from MIT after New Yorker expose.
joi_ito.ev: Flight manifest HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_008115. Secretly channeled Epstein funding to MIT. New Yorker expose by Ronan Farrow revealed concealment scheme.
joi_ito.status: Alive. Resigned from MIT Media Lab September 2019. Resigned from NYT board and other positions. Left multiple board seats. Continues tech investing in Japan.

lawrence_krauss.bg: Foundation Professor at Arizona State University (resigned 2019). Author of 'A Universe from Nothing.' Prominent science communicator and atheism advocate. Separate BuzzFeed investigation reported sexual harassment allegations.
lawrence_krauss.conn: ~200 emails. Defended Epstein in BuzzFeed article. Proposed 'men of the world conference' naming Spacey. Three-way article exchange with Chomsky and Epstein about fanaticism. Heidelberg conference connections.
lawrence_krauss.ev: ~200 emails. Proposed 'men of the world conference' naming Kevin Spacey (160 stars). Publicly defended Epstein in media. Separate harassment scandal at ASU.
lawrence_krauss.status: Alive. Resigned from ASU 2019 after sexual harassment investigation. Epstein relationship compounded his professional downfall. No longer holds university position.

michael_wolff.bg: Author of 'Fire and Fury: Inside the Trump White House' (2018), bestselling account of Trump's first year. Media columnist and author of multiple books about media moguls. Founded Newser aggregation site.
michael_wolff.conn: 150 emails + 24 iMessages. Reported Bannon meetings to Epstein. 'Three hours with SB who believes DJT won't last.' Introduced to Ken Starr via Epstein.
michael_wolff.ev: 150 emails + 24 iMessages documenting him as intelligence conduit between Bannon/Trump White House and Epstein.
michael_wolff.status: Alive. Continues writing and media commentary. Published additional Trump books. His role as intermediary between Epstein and White House circles documented in archive.

jean_luc_brunel.bg: French model scout and founder of MC2 Model Management in Miami. Previously ran Karin Models in Paris. Multiple women accused him of sexual assault and drugging dating back to the 1980s. CBS 60 Minutes investigated him in 1988.
jean_luc_brunel.conn: ~80 emails. MC2 modeling agency funded by Epstein. Supplied young models/girls to Epstein according to multiple victims. Travel from Zagreb/Tel Aviv documented in emails.
jean_luc_brunel.ev: ~80 emails. MC2 agency funded by Epstein. Multiple victims named him as procurer. Virginia Giuffre alleged Brunel trafficked girls as young as 12.
jean_luc_brunel.status: Deceased. Found hanged in his Paris jail cell February 19, 2022 while awaiting trial for rape and sexual assault of minors. Death ruled suicide. Second Epstein associate to die by hanging in custody.

reid_weingarten.bg: Partner at Steptoe & Johnson LLP. One of Washington's premier white-collar criminal defense attorneys. Has represented numerous high-profile clients including former Enron executive and other corporate figures.
reid_weingarten.conn: ~300 emails. Legal counsel for Epstein during Trump era. Trump/Mueller discussions, 'beginning of the end' commentary. Provided legal strategy advice.
reid_weingarten.ev: ~300 emails providing legal counsel to convicted sex offender post-plea deal, including political intelligence about Trump-Russia investigation.
reid_weingarten.status: Alive. Continues practicing law at Steptoe & Johnson. Attorney-client privilege limits scrutiny of his role.

kathy_ruemmler.bg: Former White House Counsel under Obama (2011-2014). Now General Counsel at Goldman Sachs. Previously at DOJ where she prosecuted Enron executives. One of the most powerful women in American law.
kathy_ruemmler.conn: ~200 emails. Legal advice and political commentary including 'Trump is truly stupid.' Susan Rice case discussions. Wall Street Journal revealed she visited Epstein's home and island.
kathy_ruemmler.ev: ~200 emails. WSJ revealed visits to Epstein's Manhattan home and private island while serving as a senior Goldman Sachs executive.
kathy_ruemmler.status: Alive. General Counsel at Goldman Sachs. Goldman retained her despite Epstein revelations. No criminal charges.

noam_chomsky.bg: MIT Institute Professor Emeritus. Father of modern linguistics. Most cited living scholar. Author of 100+ books on linguistics, politics, and philosophy. Considered the most influential public intellectual of the modern era.
noam_chomsky.conn: ~20 emails. Introduced to Ehud Barak via Epstein. Three-way article exchange with Krauss on fanaticism. When asked in 2023, initially said meetings were 'none of your business.'
noam_chomsky.ev: Epstein brokered Chomsky-Barak dinner ('chomsly is in new york'). Three-way intellectual exchange used by Epstein for academic legitimacy.
noam_chomsky.status: Alive but declining health. Suffered major stroke June 2023. Age 97. Recovering at home in Brazil. Epstein connection tarnished legacy among some supporters.

reid_hoffman.bg: Co-founder of LinkedIn ($26.2B acquisition by Microsoft 2016). Partner at Greylock Partners. Early investor in Facebook, Airbnb. Major Democratic donor. Net worth ~$2.5B. Board member at Microsoft.
reid_hoffman.conn: CONFIRMED on flight STT to BOS, Nov 30 2014, N908JE with Epstein, Joi Ito, Andreas Machl (HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_008115). Flew from US Virgin Islands — Epstein's island territory.
reid_hoffman.ev: Flight manifest HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_008115 from St. Thomas (near Epstein's island) to Boston with Joi Ito.
reid_hoffman.status: Alive. Publicly apologized 2019, said he was 'deeply embarrassed.' Donated to victims' charities. Continues as major tech investor and Microsoft board member.

martin_nowak.bg: Professor of mathematics and biology at Harvard. Director of Program for Evolutionary Dynamics. Leading researcher in evolutionary game theory. Member of Pontifical Academy of Sciences. Published 500+ papers.
martin_nowak.conn: CONFIRMED on flight Sep 4 2015 with Bob Berwick and Andy Knoll (HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_001880). Received $6.5M in Epstein funding — one of largest known academic donations from Epstein.
martin_nowak.ev: $6.5M in Epstein funding to Harvard program. Flight manifest HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_001880 with other Epstein-funded academics.
martin_nowak.status: Alive. Placed on administrative leave by Harvard during Epstein review 2020. Program lost independent status. Eventually returned to teaching. $6.5M remains one of most controversial academic donations.

woody_allen.bg: Prolific filmmaker with 50+ films including Annie Hall, Manhattan, Midnight in Paris. Four Academy Awards. Career overshadowed by allegations from adopted daughter Dylan Farrow and marriage to Soon-Yi Previn. Net worth ~$140M.
woody_allen.conn: TWO CONFIRMED FLIGHTS: (1) TEB to Paris Mar 21 2013 with 'Mrs Allen' and Anonymous Female (HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_006286). (2) Treasure Cay to PBI Feb 16 2013 with Larry Summers (HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_006294). Wife Soon-Yi had 71 iMessages with Epstein.
woody_allen.ev: Two flight manifests. Soon-Yi Previn's 71 iMessages. Transatlantic flight with anonymous female. Listed in JPhotos people directory.
woody_allen.status: Alive, age 90. Semi-retired from filmmaking. HBO documentary 'Allen v. Farrow' (2021) renewed controversy. Epstein flights add another layer to troubled legacy.

kevin_spacey.bg: Two-time Academy Award winner (American Beauty, The Usual Suspects). Star of House of Cards. Former artistic director of London's Old Vic theatre. Career collapsed in 2017 after multiple sexual misconduct allegations.
kevin_spacey.conn: Confirmed on Lolita Express Africa trip 2002 with Bill Clinton and Chris Tucker. Appears in JPhotos archive. Named in Krauss's 'men of the world conference' email (160 stars).
kevin_spacey.ev: Confirmed Lolita Express flight to Africa with Clinton. JPhotos thumbnail alongside Epstein, Maxwell, Clinton, Gates, Trump.
kevin_spacey.status: Alive. Acquitted of UK sexual assault charges July 2023. NY civil case dismissed 2022. Attempting career comeback in low-budget European productions. Largely blacklisted from Hollywood.

david_copperfield.bg: Most commercially successful magician in history. Known for Statue of Liberty disappearance and walking through Great Wall of China. Owns Musha Cay islands in Bahamas. Net worth ~$875M.
david_copperfield.conn: Named in victim depositions as visiting Little St. James Island. Extensive black book entry. Virginia Giuffre alleged Epstein claimed Copperfield knew about trafficking. He denies all wrongdoing.
david_copperfield.ev: Named in victim depositions regarding island visits. Virginia Giuffre allegations. Extensive black book entry with multiple contact numbers.
david_copperfield.status: Alive. Continues Las Vegas residency at MGM Grand. Separately faced misconduct allegations 2018 (denied). No criminal charges related to Epstein.

naomi_campbell.bg: One of the original 'Big Six' supermodels. First Black woman on cover of French Vogue. Global fashion icon for 35+ years. Founded Fashion for Relief charity. Became mother at age 50 in 2021. Net worth ~$80M.
naomi_campbell.conn: Named in flight logs. Part of NYC/Caribbean celebrity social circle overlapping with Epstein-Maxwell world. Connected through fashion industry that Epstein accessed via Brunel.
naomi_campbell.ev: Named in Lolita Express flight logs. Social connections through fashion/modeling industry.
naomi_campbell.status: Alive. Continues modeling and business. UK Charity Commission found misconduct at Fashion for Relief 2024 (unrelated to Epstein). Has not publicly addressed flight log appearances.

sarah_ferguson.bg: Former wife of Prince Andrew. Member of British royal family. Author, TV personality, Weight Watchers spokesperson. Faced persistent financial difficulties after 1996 divorce. Diagnosed with breast cancer 2023, melanoma 2024.
sarah_ferguson.conn: Received £15,000 payment from Epstein channeled through Prince Andrew. She publicly acknowledged this as a 'gigantic error of judgment.' Connected primarily through ex-husband Andrew.
sarah_ferguson.ev: Documented £15K payment from Epstein via Prince Andrew, which she publicly confirmed and apologized for.
sarah_ferguson.status: Alive. Recovering from cancer treatments. Publicly apologized for accepting Epstein money. Remains supportive of Prince Andrew.

mark_epstein.bg: Jeffrey Epstein's brother. Managed properties in New York including apartments on East 66th Street that prosecutors investigated for potential use in trafficking operation. Small-scale real estate business.
mark_epstein.conn: ~100 emails spanning all eras. Putin/Trump joke = 4,480 stars (most starred email in entire archive). Managed properties investigated by prosecutors for trafficking use.
mark_epstein.ev: Most-starred email in archive (4,480 stars). Management of E 66th St apartments where victims were reportedly housed.
mark_epstein.status: Alive. Testified in Maxwell trial Dec 2021. Deposed multiple times in civil cases. Claims no knowledge of brother's crimes. Low public profile.

emad_hanna.bg: Managed Jeffrey Epstein's extensive property portfolio, particularly Little St. James Island operations in the US Virgin Islands. Little known about pre-Epstein background.
emad_hanna.conn: ~300 emails. Managed Little St. James operations — the private island where widespread abuse allegedly occurred. Property maintenance and logistics coordination.
emad_hanna.ev: Direct management of Little St. James Island operations where victims allege widespread abuse occurred.
emad_hanna.status: Alive. Not criminally charged. Low public profile. Operational role documented in court filings.

larry_visoski.bg: Epstein's longtime personal pilot for nearly 25 years (1991-2019). Flew Boeing 727 (N908JE), Gulfstream (N909JE) and other aircraft. Logged 4,292 flights, 10,343 hours, transported 3,302 passengers. The 'Lolita Express' pilot.
larry_visoski.conn: ~200 emails. Listed as crew on virtually all high-profile flights including Gates, Allen, Summers, Hoffman, Dershowitz manifests. Firsthand witness to every major Epstein flight.
larry_visoski.ev: Listed as crew on all confirmed HOUSE_OVERSIGHT flight manifests. Flew 4,292 documented flights over 25 years.
larry_visoski.status: Alive. Testified at Maxwell trial Nov 2021. Said he never witnessed sexual activity on planes. Granted immunity in exchange for testimony.

nadia_marcinkova.bg: Reportedly brought to US from Slovakia by Epstein when she was ~15. Epstein reportedly told associates he 'purchased' her. Later became commercial pilot and attempted rebrand as 'Global Girl.' Multiple victims identified her as both victim and participant.
nadia_marcinkova.conn: ~40 emails. Named as both victim (brought from Eastern Europe as minor) and participant in abuse by multiple victims. Named as potential co-conspirator in federal investigations.
nadia_marcinkova.ev: Multiple victim testimonies describing dual role as trafficking victim and participant. 'Model death' notification email to Epstein.
nadia_marcinkova.status: Alive. Received non-prosecution agreement in 2008 plea deal. Lives as Nadia Marcinko / 'Global Girl.' Filed motions to keep name sealed. Never charged despite co-conspirator designation.

sarah_kellen.bg: Epstein's personal assistant who managed scheduling and logistics. Identified by victims as key recruiter who scheduled 'massage' appointments. Married NASCAR driver Brian Vickers 2013. Now works as interior designer.
sarah_kellen.conn: ~30 emails. Coordinated helicopter, Ferrari, operational logistics. Named as potential co-conspirator. Victims describe her as primary scheduler of sexual encounters with clinical efficiency.
sarah_kellen.ev: Named as potential co-conspirator. Multiple victims identified her as primary scheduler of abuse appointments.
sarah_kellen.status: Alive. Received non-prosecution agreement in 2008. Named in 2023-2024 document releases. Identified as co-conspirator. Living as Sarah Vickers. Never criminally charged.

anthony_scaramucci.bg: Founder of SkyBridge Capital. Briefly served as White House Communications Director (11 days) under Trump in 2017. Harvard Law graduate. CNBC contributor. Net worth ~$200M.
anthony_scaramucci.conn: 107 iMessages. Political advice exchanges with Epstein.
anthony_scaramucci.status: Alive. Continues running SkyBridge Capital. Became Trump critic. Media commentator.

ken_starr.bg: Former Solicitor General. Led Whitewater investigation of Clinton as Independent Counsel. President of Baylor University (forced out over sexual assault scandal). Member of Trump's impeachment defense team.
ken_starr.conn: ~20 emails. Rubenfeld discussion. Introduced to Michael Wolff via Epstein. Part of Epstein's legal world connections.
ken_starr.ev: ~20 emails with Epstein. Introduced to Wolff via Epstein, creating media-legal intelligence pathway.
ken_starr.status: Deceased. Died September 13, 2022 from complications after surgery. Was 76.

robert_trivers.bg: Rutgers University professor. Pioneer of sociobiology and evolutionary psychology. Developed theories of reciprocal altruism, parent-offspring conflict, and self-deception. Described by Steven Pinker as 'one of the great thinkers in the history of Western thought.'
robert_trivers.conn: ~50 emails. Biology discussions with Epstein. David Haig introduction. Part of Epstein's academic legitimacy network.
robert_trivers.ev: ~50 emails discussing evolutionary biology with convicted sex offender.

nicholas_ribis.bg: Business executive connected to Trump Organization and Mar-a-Lago circles. Served as president of Trump's Castle casino in Atlantic City.
nicholas_ribis.conn: ~50 emails. Trump/Stormy Daniels gossip relay. Manafort news. Mar-a-Lago golf sightings reported to Epstein.
nicholas_ribis.ev: ~50 emails relaying Trump gossip and Mar-a-Lago intelligence to Epstein.

landon_thomas.bg: Former New York Times reporter covering finance and wealth. Known for sympathetic profiles of wealthy figures. Fired from NYT after his Epstein connections were revealed.
landon_thomas.conn: ~50 emails. Pitched profiles of Epstein contacts to NYT. Apple analysis shared. Barrack profile coordination. Used journalistic access to serve Epstein's interests.
landon_thomas.ev: ~50 emails showing NYT reporter coordinating with Epstein on profiles of his contacts, compromising journalistic independence.
landon_thomas.status: Alive. Fired from New York Times. His relationship with Epstein represents one of the most significant journalistic ethics failures in the case.

cecilia_steen.bg: Swedish contact who maintained correspondence with Epstein across all four eras (pre-conviction through Trump presidency). Sent numbered reports. Discussed Bell 430 helicopter.
cecilia_steen.conn: ~60 emails spanning all eras. Sent numbered reports to Epstein. 'With love' — one of the last messages in the archive, sent after his July 2019 arrest.
cecilia_steen.ev: 'My dearest Jeffrey' email after arrest (385 stars). One of only six contacts present across all four eras.
cecilia_steen.status: Alive. One of the most enduring and mysterious contacts in the archive.

sultan_bin_sulayem.bg: Chairman of DP World, one of world's largest port operators. Group Chairman of Dubai World. One of Dubai's most powerful business figures. Key player in UAE's economic transformation.
sultan_bin_sulayem.conn: ~100 emails. Carbyne startup investment with Ehud Barak. Donations. Dubai business connections. Bridge between Epstein and Gulf wealth.
sultan_bin_sulayem.ev: ~100 emails connecting Epstein to Dubai/Gulf business and Carbyne investment with Barak.
sultan_bin_sulayem.status: Alive. Continues as DP World chairman. No criminal charges. His Epstein connection less scrutinized than Western figures.

john_amerling.bg: Managed island operations and properties for Epstein. Handled prefab homes, boats, Puerto Rico operations. Operational counterpart to Emad Hanna.
john_amerling.conn: ~100 emails. Island operations, prefab homes, boats, Puerto Rico. Operational infrastructure maintenance.
john_amerling.ev: ~100 emails documenting operational management of Epstein's island infrastructure.
john_amerling.status: Alive. Not criminally charged. Low public profile.

al_seckel.bg: Self-styled expert on optical illusions and perception. TED speaker. Turned PR consultant who helped manage reputations. History of fraud allegations and misrepresentation of credentials.
al_seckel.conn: ~30 emails. Post-plea reputation management for Epstein. Monitored search results and online reputation. PR/damage control after 2008 conviction.
al_seckel.ev: ~30 emails showing systematic reputation management and search result monitoring for convicted sex offender.
al_seckel.status: Deceased. Died in 2015 under disputed circumstances (reported fall from cliff in France). Multiple fraud allegations preceded death.

peter_mandelson.bg: Senior Labour politician. Twice Cabinet minister under Tony Blair. EU Trade Commissioner. Now Baron Mandelson. Key architect of 'New Labour.' Currently Chancellor of Oxford University. Close friend of Jeffrey Epstein.
peter_mandelson.conn: ~20 emails. 'No!!' response to something in archive. Part of Epstein's international political network connecting UK Labour establishment.
